across monotone equivs

PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

nodes.body:
### PR summary [74a34e52d4](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/15950/commits/74a34e52d4b5ea5b9867ec410a8dd951a065ef56)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ IsPredArchimedean`
`+ IsSuccArchimedean`
`+ OrderHomClass.toOrderHomClassOrderDual`
`+ PredOrder`
`+ SuccOrder`
`+ instance (priority := 100) OrderIsoClass.toOrderIsoClassOrderDual [LE α] [LE β]`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>
Note that there's currently a large refactor for `SuccOrder` underway in #15881.

> Note that there's currently a large refactor for `SuccOrder` underway in #15881.

I hope that these transfer constructions, especially since they are over linear orders, should be easy to include in the refactor if it proceeds.

> Note that there's currently a large refactor for `SuccOrder` underway in #15881.

Updated after the refactor.
I think your new hom class pattern should be discussed on Zulip. I am of the opinion that it is a bad idea, but I would like feedback from more people
Would you prefer the plain `OrderIso` based transfer I did in #16490?
Yeah, that would be much better
Closed in favor of #16785.
This can't be an instance because `α` and `β` are out-params in `OrderHomClass`
It worked at my site of use here: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/15950/files#diff-6c24c5f799f540195c932d072bf980aa91eaf384ac4fecb2d64e56042aa23791R250
Ah, I see. You're saying for `OrderHom` it won't work, while I used `OrderIso`
Here however `α` and `β` are not out-params in `OrderIsoClass`? @Vierkantor, is this an oversight?

Does this not work?
```suggestion
    exact (OrderIso.isMax_apply (f : X ≃o Y)).mpr (Order.max_of_succ_le hy)
```

pullRequest.title: feat(Order/SuccPred): transfer SuccOrder, IsSuccArchimedean

source.title: feat(Order/SuccPred): transfer SuccOrder and friends over OrderIsos

nodes.body: I think your new hom class pattern should be discussed on Zulip. I am of the opinion that it is a bad idea, but I would like feedback from more people
Would you prefer the plain `OrderIso` based transfer I did in #16490?

source.title: feat(RingTheory/Valuation): valuation integers ring is a Principal Ideal ring iff the valuation range is not densely ordered

nodes.body: Yeah, that would be much better

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Order/SuccPred): transfer SuccOrder and friends over OrderIsos
